content: around chain-3 space of row 2 and chain-1 sps of row 3 and 4 simultaneously single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat from * to last chain-1 space single_crochet around chain-3 space of row and chain-1 sps of row 3 and 4 simultaneously single_crochet in last single_crochet turn row 6 repeat row 2 changing to c in last st row 7 and 8 with c repeat row 3 and 4 row 9 149 maintaining color sequence of 2 row with a 2 row with b 2 row with a 2 row with c repeat row 5 8 then repeat row 5 once more row 150 continuing with a chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across turn fasten_off b and c do not fasten_off a border round 1 continuing with a chain 1 single_crochet evenly around all edges of afghan working 3 single_crochet in each corner join with slip st in first single_crochet round 2 chain 1 working in back loops only single_crochet in each single_crochet around working 3 single_crochet in center single_crochet of each 3-single_crochet corner join with slip st in first single_crochet fasten_off finishing using yarn needle weave in all ends || yarns || free projects || where to buy || links || learning || contact us || caron connections || news || latch hook || visit bond america online ©2008 caron international http //www caron com/projects/ss_eco/sseco_eco_throw html page 2 of 2
